Package ca.queensu.cs.cisc124.notes.basics

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.queensu.cs.cisc124.notes.basics.Card
  • public class Card
extends Object
    A class representing a playing card from a standard 52-card French deck. This class uses the string enum pattern to represent the valid ranks and suits of a playing card.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String[] RANKS  
      static String[] SUITS  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Card​(String rank, String suit)
      Initializes this card to have the specified rank and suit.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card​(String rank,
            String suit)
        Initializes this card to have the specified rank and suit.
        Parameters:
        rank - the rank of this card
        suit - the suit of this card

    • Method Detail

      • rank

        public String rank()
        Returns the rank of this card. The rank is one of the strings in the array Card.RANKS.
        Returns:
        the rank of this card

      • suit

        public String suit()
        Returns the suit of this card. The suit is one of the strings in the array Card.SUITS.
        Returns:
        the suit of this card

      • colour

        public String colour()
        Returns the colour of this card. The returned string is either equal to "RED" for diamonds or hearts suits or "BLACK" for clubs or spades suits.
        Returns:
        the colour of this card

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this card. The returned string is the rank of this card followed by the string " of " followed by the suit of this card.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Object obj)
        Compares this card to the specified object for equality. The result is true if obj is a card having the same rank and the same suit as this card, false otherwise.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Returns:
        true if obj is a card having the same rank and the same suit as this card, false otherwise

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Returns a hash code for this card.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Object
        Returns:
        a hash code for this card

      • main

        public static void main​(String[] args)
